attributes.action: modify roadtax in proportion to polluntant levels
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Road tax charge to be in proportion to polutant output. This could be achieved as the levels are recorded during MOT testing and recorded now in a central database. This should apply to all road vehicles including commercial.  Charges from zero for example electric power to max on badly maintained vehicles.  New vehicles not subject to MOT would be taxed at manufacturers data and the first few years an immission test would be needed before allowing to be taxed.
